channel.title: About on Zangwei
channel.description: Recent content in About on Zangwei

item.title: About Me
item.author: zhengzangw@gmail.com (Zangwei (Alex) Zheng)
item.description: I am a Ph.D. student at National University of Singapore, advised by Prof. Yang You. I received my B.Sc. in Computer Science from Nanjing University in 2021. I spent a year in iCyPy at UC Berkeley from Apr. 2020, supervised by Prof. Alberto L. Sangiovanni-Vincentelli and Dr. Xiangyu Yue. We are hiring Research Interns, more details can be found here. Feel free to contact me.

item.title: Research Interest
item.author: zhengzangw@gmail.com (Zangwei (Alex) Zheng)
item.description: My current research lies in efficient maching learning and optimization, mainly including: Efficient Fine-tuning of LLMs (large language models) and Language-Vision models. Optimization: Optimizer design and forward-forward algorithm. Improving GPU’s utilization: large-batch training and kernal ops optimization. Improving dataset efficiency: collect high-quality data with low cost.

item.title: News
item.author: zhengzangw@gmail.com (Zangwei (Alex) Zheng)
item.description: [2023.7] Got one first-authored paper accepted to ICCV 2023. Thanks to all my collaborators! [2023.7] CAME paper won the ACL Outstanding Paper Award! [2023.5] Got one paper accepted to ACL 2023. Congratulations to Yang Luo! [2023.4] Got one paper accpeted to ICML 2023. Congratulations to Fuzhao Xue! [2023.3] ColossalChat has been released! Train your own version of ChatGPT. Congratulations to colleges at HPCAITech! [2023.2] CowClip paper won the AAAI Distinguished Paper Award!

item.title: Selected Awards

item.description: 2023, Research Achievement Award of NUS 2023, ACL 2023 Outstanding Paper Award 2023, AAAI 2023 Distinguished Paper Award 2022, Papers with Code Contributor Award 2021, Outstanding Graduates of Nanjing University 2020, Outstanding Student of Nanjing University 2019, 2018 (2 times), National Elite Program First-Class Scholarship 2019, Zheng Gang Overseas Study Scholarship
